_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Airplane
author: info@ttr3.eu
description:
A stable, optimized and fast Paper fork.
https://github.com/TECHNOVE/Airplane

installation.script:
apt update
apt -y install wget
cd /mnt/server
if [ -z "$BUILDVERSION" ] || [ "$BUILDVERSION" == "latest" ]; then
    wget https://ci.tivy.ca/job/Airplane-${VER}/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/launcher-airplane.jar -O ${SERVER_JARFILE}
else
    wget https://ci.tivy.ca/job/Airplane-${VER}/${BUILDVERSION}/artifact/launcher-airplane.jar -O ${SERVER_JARFILE}
fi

variables.name: Server file name
variables.description: Here you can set the server jar's name

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description: Here you can set the server's version (1.17 or 1.16)

variables.name: Build version
variables.description:
Here you can set which build version you want to use from Airplane release
(You can see the version from this site https://ci.tivy.ca)

Example: https://ci.tivy.ca/job/Airplane-1.17/(Build version)/artifact/launcher-airplane.jar
